archimate:Requirement.name: SY.2.3.6: Specialised backup arrangements should be defined to enable the complete restoration of multiple systems where a serious cyber attack has occurred (e.g. a ransomware or nation state attack).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
